item.title: STEM Fair in Cali
item.description: Igniting Innovation: The STEM Fair Experience [Credit: Cambio] The National STEM + Green and Sustainable Valley First Fair, organized under the project “Enhancing Education Quality through Digital Technologies for 21st-Century Learning in Valle del Cauca’s non-certified municipalities,” aims to promote innovation, creativity, and STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) skills among the educational community. Fostering Innovation and Education [Credit: Alcald√≠a de Cali] The fair serves as a hub for sharing innovative ideas, exploring cutting-edge tech trends, and collaborating with passionate tech enthusiasts.
